info.title: Salesforce Case Assistant API
info.description: API for querying Salesforce cases with natural language. CRITICAL: ALL case responses must use the mandatory 4-section structure: 1) Case Summarization & Contextualization, 2) Technical Case Summary, 3) Troubleshooting Steps, 4) Action. Never provide simple status messages - always use the complete structured format with section headers.

post.summary: Query Salesforce cases with natural language - ALL responses must use 4-section structure
post.description: Submit natural language queries to get case information with mandatory 4-section analysis: 1) Case Summarization & Contextualization, 2) Technical Case Summary, 3) Troubleshooting Steps, 4) Action. Every case response must follow this structure regardless of query type.

query.description: Natural language query about Salesforce cases (e.g., 'Show me case 12345', 'List all in progress cases', 'Get comments for case 12345')

session_id.description: Optional session identifier for maintaining conversation context

200.description: Successful response with case data or analysis

message.description: IMPORTANT: For ALL case responses, you MUST format your response using this 4-section structure: 1) Case Summarization & Contextualization, 2) Technical Case Summary (Issue Type, Fix Status, Validation Status, Current State, Closure Dependency), 3) Troubleshooting / Resolution Recommendation Steps, 4) Action. Always use section headers and provide comprehensive analysis even for simple status requests.

instructions.description: Detailed formatting instructions that MUST be followed for proper response structure

get.description: Verify that the Salesforce connection is working properly
